snippet.title: Retail Company Simulator | Steam Trailer
snippet.description: Run your retail company. Sign contracts with leading brands, order new products, meet customer needs, and never let your customers leave the store empty-handed. Hire new workers, expand your store, and enjoy the growth of your retail company.
